course_description: This course builds on the technical skills introduced in Dance 123R. Emphasis is placed on centering, core support, breath support, full articulation of the body in three-dimensional space, fully integrating concepts of parallel and rotation, and the interplay of stability and mobility. At least three semesters in the Contemporary Modern Dance I and consultation with instructor is required before entry into this course. May be taken up to three times for credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 2548, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: K. O'Neal, Status: Open
